name: stay warm with me
description:
A two-minute rhythm game made in a day for Winter Break Jam, and a love letter to everything I find warm and comforting: electronic music, first person shooters, warm colors, vocoders, and cuddles :)

away in another place
a hall of edges and rain
you bare your teeth

why don't you stay
where the sun is warm
and sand soaks up your tears?

let me hold you till tomorrow
you'll stay warm with me
